choices.name: choice_convert_self_service_org
choices.choiceText: Convert an existing self service organization to a new, annual subscription

choices.name: Choice_coterm_expansion
choices.choiceText: Coterminous expansion to an existing agreement

choices.name: choice_new_commitment
choices.choiceText: New annual subscription, unrelated to any existing self service subscriptions

choices.name: Choice_new_subsidiary
choices.choiceText: New independent team or subsidiary at the company

decisions.name: Base_opp_expiring_soon
decisions.label: Base opp expiring in next 60 days?

decisions.name: Is_user_SQ_AE_or_manager
decisions.label: Is user SQ AE or manager?

formulas.name: SS_Org_Table_Where_Clause
formulas.expression: "Account__c = '"&{!recordId.AccountId}&"' AND Subscription_Type__c = 'Self Service' AND Is_Archived__c = FALSE AND IsDeleted = FALSE AND Stripe_State__c = 'active'"

value.stringValue: Please select the primary contact you met with as part of the qualification process

fields.name: committed_expansion_header
fields.fieldText: We found one or more active committed agreements with this customer.

fields.name: Please_select_the_option_below_that_best_describes_this_deal
fields.fieldText: Please select the option below this best describes this deal:

fields.name: base_deal_choice_list
fields.fieldText: Please select the active agreement to which this expansion deal applies:

fields.name: base_opp_warning
fields.fieldText: If the active agreement you are trying to expand is not listed, please contact Sales Operations.

fields.name: new_sub_warning
fields.fieldText: IMPORTANT: Please note that if this deal closes, a new Business Unit will be created on this account.

fields.name: big_deal_warning_message
fields.fieldText:
Warning: You are about to pipe this deal for ${!recordId.Amount}


This appears to be a very large deal relative to other {!recordId.Segment__c} segment deals. Please confirm that you intend to forecast this deal at the above amount or go back and revise your forecast:

fields.name: big_deal_warning_message_0
fields.fieldText:
Warning: You are about to pipe this deal for ${!recordId.Amount}, which is below the minimum deal size (${!Get_opp_automation_settings.Min_Land_Size__c}) for the customer's segment ({!recordId.Segment__c}). A deal below this minimum will require CRO approval to pass Deal Desk.


Please confirm that you intend to forecast this deal at the above amount or go back and revise your forecast:

fields.name: big_deal_warning_message_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Warning: You are about to pipe this deal for ${!recordId.Amount}


This appears to be a very small deal relative to other {!recordId.Segment__c} segment deals. Please confirm that you intend to forecast this deal at the above amount or go back and revise your forecast:

fields.name: big_deal_warning_message_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: You cannot pipe an opportunity for $0. Please go back and revise.

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText:
You cannot SQO this opportunity because you are not the qualifying AE.


Only {!recordId.Sales_Qualified_By__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Sales_Qualified_By__r.LastName} may qualify this opportunity.

fields.name: Message_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot SQO this Professional Services opportunity because you are not on the Professional Services team.


Only {!recordId.Sales_Qualified_By__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Sales_Qualified_By__r.LastName} may qualify this opportunity.

fields.name: Message_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot SQO this opportunity because we are not able to sell to companies operating in {!Get_country_definition.Name}

fields.name: Message_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot SQO this opportunity because there is a late open renewal on this account.


Please work with the customer to resolve the late renewal before proceeding with this opportunity.

screens.name: Coterminus_Expansion_Set_Projected_Start_Date
screens.label: Coterminus Expansion - Set Projected Start Date

fields.name: Start_date_instructions
fields.fieldText: Select the estimated service start date for this expansion. You will be able to change this later.

fields.name: Coterm_start_date
fields.fieldText: Please select the estimated service start date for this expansion:

validationRule.errorMessage: The selected service start date is too close to the underlying agreement's end date. Please select a date at least 30 days before {!Get_base_opp.Contract_End_Date__c}.

fields.name: end_date_notice
fields.fieldText: The service end date will be {!Get_base_opp.Contract_End_Date__c} (coterminous with the previously selected active agreement).

fields.name: Error_header
fields.fieldText:
Error: You cannot SQO this opportunity right now:


{!Get_global_permission.Reason__c}

fields.name: Error_badsubtyle
fields.fieldText:
Error: Please notify Revenue Operations with this error message:


SQO Button: Bad subtype [{!recordId.Subtype__c}]

screens.name: Error_Underlying_Agreement_Too_Close_to_Renewal
screens.label: Error - Underlying Agreement Too Close to Renewal

fields.name: Too_close_to_Renewal
fields.fieldText:
You cannot create a coterminous expansion using the selected active agreement because that agreement expires in {!Base_opp_days_to_end_date} days.


To proceed, please do one of the following:


1) Locate the customer's upcoming open renewal and work this deal as an expansion at the point of renewal

2) Reach out to Sales Operations if you would like an exception to proceed

value.stringValue: Select the primary contact you met with as part of the qualification process

fields.name: screen_started_at
fields.fieldText: On what date did you first meet with this contact for this deal?

validationRule.errorMessage: Date must be date today or in the past

fields.name: Post_to_ops_test_instead_of
fields.fieldText: Post SQO notification to #ops-test

fields.name: cvo2
fields.fieldText: To mark this opportunity as sales qualified and advance to stage (2) Discovery, please verify the following (learn more about our qualification criteria):

fields.name: Budget
fields.fieldText: Budget

fields.name: bant_budget
fields.fieldText: Budget

fields.name: bant_Budget_Comments_Long
fields.fieldText: Budget Comments

fields.name: bant_criteria
fields.fieldText:
Acceptance Criteria [Budget]:

  • Company is funded, publicly traded, or has expressed the ability to buy Retool
  • Company has not directly expressed an inability to budget for Retool

fields.name: Authority
fields.fieldText: Authority

fields.name: bant_Authority_Comments_long
fields.fieldText: Authority Comments

fields.name: authority_criteria
fields.fieldText:
Acceptance Criteria [Authority]:

We have access to an identified buyer or champion:

  • Economic Buyers include budget owners (e.g., C-Suite, VPs, Directors, High-level Product Managers / Engineering Managers)
  • Champions include technical stakeholders (e.g., Engineers, Engineering Managers, Product Managers, other leadership)

fields.name: Need
fields.fieldText: Need

fields.name: bant_need
fields.fieldText: Need (Largest Identified)

fields.name: Need_Comments_long
fields.fieldText: Need Comments

fields.name: need_cirtiera
fields.fieldText:
Acceptance Criteria [Need]:

We have identified one of the following:

  • A need/pain that Retool solves
  • A use case that Retool solves
  • A project / initiative within the organization to build or improve internal tools
  • A need / pain identified by the prospect that Retool can help with AND willingness to engage in the sales process

fields.name: Timeline
fields.fieldText: Timeline

fields.name: bant_Timeline
fields.fieldText: Timeline

fields.name: Timeline_Comments_long
fields.fieldText: Timeline Comments

fields.name: timeline_criteriea_tap
fields.fieldText:
Acceptance Criteria for Target Accounts [Timeline]:

  • A commitment to do deeper discovery with Retool
  • Agreed and scheduled next discovery meeting

fields.name: timeline_criteria_nontap
fields.fieldText:
Acceptance Criteria [Timeline]:

  • We have identified a timeline to actively evaluate and solve the need using Retool within 9 months of the discovery call

OR

  • We have a clearly identified next step with a meeting on the calendar within the next 30 days

fields.name: cvo2_0
fields.fieldText: To mark this opportunity as sales qualified and advance to stage (2) Discovery, please verify the following:

fields.name: Customer_Value_Framework_0
fields.fieldText: Customer Value Framework

fields.name: cvo23_0
fields.fieldText:
• Before Scenarios: A use case / initiative to build / rebuild some operations workflow
  • Negative Consequences: Pain (or gain) with urgency / intent to resolve aligned to one of our Value Drivers
  • Stakeholder who is an influencer

fields.name: Before_Scenarios_0
fields.fieldText: Before Scenarios

fields.name: Negative_Consequences_0
fields.fieldText: Negative Consequences

fields.name: Value_Drivers_screen_0
fields.fieldText: Value Driver(s)

fields.name: acct_missing_data_header
fields.fieldText: This account is missing some basic information. Before proceeding, please review and populate/correct any of the data below:

fields.name: acct_name
fields.fieldText: Account Name

fields.name: acct_emp
fields.fieldText: Number of Employees (from LinkedIn)

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a number of employees greater than zero. Use LinkedIn as your source.

value.stringValue: Website (make sure to include the https:// in the front)

fields.name: acct_country
fields.fieldText: Headquarters Country (from LinkedIn or company website)

fields.name: Industry_screen
fields.fieldText: Industry

textTemplates.name: clear_bu_resume_date_chatter
textTemplates.text: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} cleared resume date due to new open Committed Expansion. Opportunity: {!recordId.Name}

textTemplates.name: sales_sqo_slack_post
textTemplates.text:
New Qualified Opportunity: {!recordId.Name_Entity_Prefix__c} - {!recordId.Subtype__c}


{!recordId.Account.Segment__c} ({!recordId.Account.NumberOfEmployees} emp.) | {!recordId.Account.Industry} | {!recordId.Account.ShippingCountry} ({!recordId.Account.Shipping_Region__c}) {!slack_tap}


Qualification Decision In: {!recordId.Days_to_Qualification_Decision__c} days

Amount: ${!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c}

Owner: {!recordId.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Sales Manager: {!recordId.Sales_Manager__r.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Sourced By: {!recordId.Sourced_By__r.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c} {!fast_pass_flag}

Sales Engineer: {!se_slack} {!ent_strat_se_leads_slack}

Next Step: {!recordId.NextStep} ({!recordId.Next_Step_Date__c})


:white_check_mark: Customer Verifiable Outcomes :white_check_mark:


Value Driver: {!recordId.Value_Driver__c}

Before Scenarios: {!recordId.Before_Scenarios__c}

Negative Consequences: {!recordId.Negative_Consequences__c}

{!vertical_team_slack}


{!slack_show_bant}

textTemplates.name: slack_SQO_successful_reply
textTemplates.text: {!recordId.Sales_Qualified_By__r.Slack_Mention_Handle_Only__c} has marked this deal as sales qualified.
